page.title: 05EDUCATION
page.content: Since there are no schools in our D block, many of the children travel to nearby villages. When they are older they go to Swanmore or Fareham. For Further Education people go to the Sixth Form Colleges in either Fareham or Southampton, where the nearest University is. Nearby private schools are Rookesbury Park, Fairfields and Westhill. {EMPLOYMENT} Unemployment is very low in our D block, about 5-l0%. Quite a few people employ others, e.g. cleaners and gardeners and have their own fees. Some people in the area go to Fairthorne Manor and join the course for training to be a "day camp leader".
